item.title: Databricks Cheatsheet
item.description: General Shortcut Description Ctrl + / Multiline comment + / Toggle line comment Spark Dataframe Shortcut Description df.head() returns first few rows of a dataframe df.count() returns count of non null values of all columns in a dataframe
